price: ជាពួកដែលទាមទារចង់បានគ្រប់ចំនួននៅពេលដែលពួកគេ ថ្លឹងវាស់ ឬវាល់ពីអ្នកដទៃ។
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكۡتَالُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسۡتَوۡفُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna idhā ik'tālū ʿalā al-nāsi yastawfūna
